JOB DESCRIPTION:
Senior Software Engineer - .NET
 Experience : ( 4+ ) years  .NET Job Code : SSE.NET/  35 Designation : Senior Software Engineer - .NET Experience : 4+ years of experience Location : Trivandrum Requirement : Sound in programming fundamentals,  with exposure to good programming practices,  design methodologies.
